entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow or rain beginning this evening then changing to periods of rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
